It follows from the previous sections that dozy chaos is introduced into theoretical physics as a new physical substance for eliminating the singularity in the rate constants of quantum transitions which occurs in molecular quantum mechanics when going beyond the adiabatic approximation. In theoretical physics, a similar procedure for introducing a new physical substance, namely, quanta, was carried out at the very beginning of the last century to eliminate the singularity in the distribution function of blackbody radiation at high frequencies. As is known from the history of physics, this singularity is often referred to as an ultraviolet catastrophe. Let me remind you the reason for ultraviolet catastrophe.
